name: sajek
placeDetails: Sajek is a town on the southeast coast of Bangladesh. It’s known for its very long, sandy beachfront, stretching highest mountains. Aggameda Khyang monastery is home to bronze statues and centuries-old Buddhist manuscripts. South of town, the tropical rainforest of Himchari National Park has waterfalls and many birds. North, sea turtles breed on nearby Sonadia Island.

name: sundorbon
placeDetails: Sundorbon is a town on the southeast coast of Bangladesh. It’s known for its very long, sandy beachfront forest in bangladesh. It is one of the largest and greatest mangrove forest in the world. People visit there by boats only. There are some guides will arrive when tourists go there. In Sundorban the special thing is The Royal Bengal Tiger is lived there. You can also see the other animals in Sundorban.

name: sreemongol
placeDetails: Sreemongol is one the greatest town in Sylhet in Bangladesh. It’s known for its colorful tea's. A person can drink 7 colors of tea in the hotels and restaurants in Sylhet. Therey serve tea in a transparent glass. You will be surprised to see the tea of seven colors in one glass. The tea is very delicious also.

name: nilgiri
placeDetails: Nilgiri is the one of the greatest place in Bandarban in Bangladesh. It’s known for its very long and highest hills. The special thing in Nilgiri is you can feel clouds are dropped in land and you will feel can touch it. In winter to much people go there for feel that kind of beauty. That is to much beautiful place. Some guides also there for help peoples who get there in Nilgiri first time.
